C

com.github.nwillc.tostring - package com.github.nwillc.tostring
 

F

FieldAccessor - Class in com.github.nwillc.tostring
Utility class providing, via reflection, access to fields of an object.

G

getField(Object, String) - Static method in class com.github.nwillc.tostring.FieldAccessor
Retrieve a specified fields value.
getFields(Object) - Static method in class com.github.nwillc.tostring.FieldAccessor
Via reflection, return all the fields declared by the object provided.

T

ToString - Class in com.github.nwillc.tostring
Utility class that will generate well formatted string descriptions of an object instance.
toString(Object) - Static method in class com.github.nwillc.tostring.ToString
Generate a string representation of the instance, displaying all it's declared fields.
toString(Object, String...) - Static method in class com.github.nwillc.tostring.ToString
Generate a string representation of the instance, displaying only the fields passed in.
toStringExcluding(Object, String...) - Static method in class com.github.nwillc.tostring.ToString
Generate a string representation of the instance, displaying all it's declared fields except the fields passed in.
